Text: Disappointing download. Lots of artifacts in the picture, which suggests over-compression despite a hefty 1.37 GB filesize. Aspect ratio is grossly distorted (and instead of fixing it the uploader recommends downloading a Windoze program which is not much help for viewing on other platforms). I have the DVD somewhere but wanted a copy to take on holiday â€“ seems like I should better take the time to rip it myself.
